Wisdom: آيَةُ [آلَةُ] الْبَلَاغَةِ قَلْبٌ عَقُولٌ وَلِسَانٌ قَائِلٌ
enWisdom: The tools of rhetoric are: an intelligent mind and an eloquent tongue

Wisdom: الْبَلَاغَةُ مَا سَهُلَ عَلَى الْمَنْطِقِ وَخَفَّ عَلَى الْفِطْنَةِ
enWisdom: Eloquence is that which is easy on speech and light on reasoning

Wisdom: الْبَلَاغَةُ أَنْ تُجِيبَ فَلَا تُبْطِئَ وَتُصِيبَ فَلَا تُخْطِئَ
enWisdom: Eloquence is to reply without hesitation and [to speak] correctly, without making mistakes
Sometimes even the eloquent one is left speechless
Giving correct reply is an evidence of merit
